availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Hazelip (Edmonson County, Kentucky, tavern keeper)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, tavern keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Polly Ann Lindsey in Edmonson County on May 7, 1846. Father of William Hazelip. Tavern keeper in Edmonson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-0039.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville, p. 34.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Edmonson County Marriages, 1833-1870, p. 7.
Find A Grave, "William "Bill" Hazelip (1823-1891)," Memorial #41257106, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41257106 (accessed May 19, 2020).
